item.description:
Hi fellow Boston Skiffy Writers! In addition to our usual monthly Meetup, we will be doing something new on Thanksgiving weekend. Quoting member Pam,

"We will meet for dimsum at 10:30 at China Pearl, Sunday November 27.
That is indeed the Sunday after Thanksgiving. You might be ready to
eat again by then. Those of us in the (Meetup-related writing) critique group will mosey off
around noon to an undisclosed location."

Join us!

China Pearl
9 Tyler Street

Directions by T:
Take the Red or Orange Line to Downtown Crossing.
Exit to Chauncey or Washington Street.
Walk south to Beach Street and turn left.
Turn right at Tyler Street.
China Pearl has a prominent round sign

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Outing!
